text: Skate 3 is a skateboarding video game that was published by Electronic Arts. It is available for the PlayStation 3 and the Xbox 360 video game systems. The game was the fourth in the Skate video game series, after Skate 2. The game takes place in the city of Port Carverton. The city also embraces skateboarding which was unlike the second game where they had a "skateboarding is a crime" mentality. The game got good reviews with a 7.5 out of 10 from GameSpot and a 80 out of 100 from Metacritic. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official game website Category:2010 video games Category:Skate (series) category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Multiplayer and single- player video games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Skateboarding video games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox One games
title: Skate 3
